httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostIssuingCardholders

Creates a new Issuing Cardholder object that can be issued cards.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\issuing\cardholders HTTP/1.1

host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded


{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

Request Body Schema

{
  "required": [
    "billing",
    "name",
    "type"
  ],
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "billing": {
      "title": "billing_specs",
      "required": [
        "address"
      ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "address": {
          "title": "required_address",
          "required": [
            "city",
            "country",
            "line1",
            "postal_code"
          ],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "city": {
              "maxLength": 5000,
              "type": "string"
            },
            "country": {
              "maxLength": 5000,
              "type": "string"
            },
            "line1": {
              "maxLength": 5000,
              "type": "string"
            },
            "line2": {
              "maxLength": 5000,
              "type": "string"
            },
            "postal_code": {
              "maxLength": 5000,
              "type": "string"
            },
            "state": {
              "maxLength": 5000,
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "description": "The cardholder's billing address."
    },
    "company": {
      "title": "company_param",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "tax_id": {
          "maxLength": 5000,
          "type": "string"
        }
      },
      "description": "Additional information about a company cardholder."
    },
    "email": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The cardholder's email address."
    },
    "expand": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "maxLength": 5000,
        "type": "string"
      },
      "description": "Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded."
    },
    "individual": {
      "title": "individual_param",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "dob": {
          "title": "date_of_birth_specs",
          "required": [
            "day",
            "month",
            "year"
          ],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "day": {
              "type": "integer"
            },
            "month": {
              "type": "integer"
            },
            "year": {
              "type": "integer"
            }
          }
        },
        "first_name": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "last_name": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "verification": {
          "title": "person_verification_param",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "document": {
              "title": "person_verification_document_param",
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "back": {
                  "maxLength": 5000,
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "front": {
                  "maxLength": 5000,
                  "type": "string"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "description": "Additional information about an individual cardholder."
    },
    "metadata": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": {
        "type": "string"
      },
      "description": "Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format. Individual keys can be unset by posting an empty value to them. All keys can be unset by posting an empty value to metadata."
    },
    "name": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The cardholder's name. This will be printed on cards issued to them. The maximum length of this field is 24 characters. This field cannot contain any special characters or numbers."
    },
    "phone_number": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The cardholder's phone number. This will be transformed to E.164 if it is not provided in that format already. This is required for all cardholders who will be creating EU cards. See the 3D Secure documentation for more details."
    },
